sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnprocessmon ( PROCS_ID /* */ , PROCS_NM /* */ , PROCS_STTUS /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #procsId# /* */ , #procsNm# /* */ , #procsSttus# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #mngrNm# /* */ , #mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnprocessmon SET PROCS_ID=#procsId# /* */ , PROCS_NM=#procsNm# /* */ , PROCS_STTUS=#procsSttus# /* */ , CREAT_DT=#creatDt# /* */ , MNGR_NM=#mngrNm# /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES=#mngrEmailAdres# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE PROCS_ID=#procsId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT PROCS_ID /* */ , PROCS_NM /* */ , PROCS_STTUS /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnprocessmon WHERE PROCS_ID=#procsId# /* */

SELECT PROCS_ID /* */ , PROCS_NM /* */ , PROCS_STTUS /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ , MNGR_NM /* */ , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnprocessmon WHERE 1=1
PROCS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
PROCS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY PROCS_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnprocessmon WHERE 1=1
PROCS_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
PROCS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
